title: Spinebreaker Serial Killer! Crimes of Stephen Hawke (1936, Crime) Directed by George King Colorized

sources.title: Spinebreaker Serial Killer! Crimes of Stephen Hawke (1936, Crime) Directed by George King Colorized
sources.description:
London is besieged by the killer nicknamed "The Spinebreaker".  Stephen Hawke must navigate a web of deceit and danger to protect his daughter and confront a menacing police chief in a thrilling race against time. 

Original title: The Crimes of Stephen Hawke (1936)
This film is available with subtitles in many languages.

Black and white version: https://youtu.be/38FLz0IphE8


Director and Producer: George King
Writers: Jack Celestin, Frederick Hayward, H.F. Maltby
Starring: Tod Slaughter, Marjorie Taylor, D.J. Williams
Genres: Colorized, Crime, Drama, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles).
04:43 A tale of murder, deception, and intrigue unfolds in a 1936 crime-thriller film featuring Tod Slaughter.
11:14 A wealthy man, Stephen Hawke, spoils his daughter Julia and plans a lavish party with influential guests.
15:58 Deception, manipulation, and intrigue unfold at a party as Lord Brickhaven's absence causes tension and reveals hidden motives.
24:40 Murder mystery unfolds at a party, with accusations and suspicions surrounding a guest named Stephen Hawke.
28:05 A father discovers a shocking secret about his friend's true nature and seeks revenge.
35:20 Mysterious departures, hidden identities, and ominous plans unravel in a thrilling tale of love and betrayal.
43:28 Intrigue and deception unfold as a young woman faces threats and seeks protection in a mysterious encounter.
46:02 A mysterious man hunts down a fugitive, while a thief seeks help and a plan to escape.
52:11 Betrayal, secrets, and forbidden love unravel in a tale of deception and heartbreak.
1:00:13 A man named Stephen Hawke reveals his true identity as the Spinebreaker and disrupts a planned marriage.
1:03:11 A tale of deception, betrayal, and murder unravels as secrets are revealed in a thrilling pursuit.
